query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yield_defect_alert_history` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `alert_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `severity` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `status` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text,
  `source` varchar(100),
  `source_id` varchar(100),
  `source_name` varchar(255),
  `metric_name` varchar(100),
  `metric_value` double,
  `threshold_value` double,
  `acknowledged_by` varchar(255),
  `acknowledged_at` bigint,
  `resolved_by` varchar(255),
  `resolved_at` bigint,
  `resolved_note` text,
  `created_at` bigint NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` bigint NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_type` (`alert_type`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_severity` (`severity`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_created` (`created_at`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yield_defect_alert_history` (

  `source_name` varchar(255),
  `metric_name` varchar(100),
  `metric_value` double,
  `threshold_value` double,
  `acknowledged_by` varchar(255),
  `acknowledged_at` bigint,
  `resolved_by` varchar(255),
  `resolved_at` bigint,
  `resolved_note` text,
  `created_at` bigint NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` bigint NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_type` (`alert_type`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_severity` (`severity`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_alert_created` (`created_at`)
);
